Subject: Unable to modify the list of DecideRule in a scope
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=343342970

I have the following reproducable behavior, both in 2.0.0 and in 2.0.1:

I launch an engine and then access it remotely via JNX. In the web UI,
when I go to a sheet, and click on "details" for the list of
decideRules in a scope, the following page does not contain the
correct objects to be created in the Create a new Object pull down
menu. The pull down menu is empty...

What's strange is that when I access a locally started engine in the
same JVM as the web UI, it works ok. The menu is correctly populated.
The settings are exactly the same between the two engines, the only
thing that differs is that one is accessed locally and the other via
JNX...

Can someone reproduce this?

Jean-Noel
